title: Pennytel
description: PennyTel is part of Australia's largest VoIP network. A decade ago, everyday-VoIP was merely a futuristic idea.  Although ahead of their time, the innovators behind PennyTel believed that this was powerful technology worth investing in.  With a commitment towards innovation, PennyTel evolved and grew, becoming Australasiaâ€™s industry leader in the provision of next-generation VoIP technologies.
